text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    77176002Smoker
    160618006Current non-smoker
    8517006Ex-smoker
    230065006Chain smoker
    230063004Heavy cigarette smoker
    230060001 Light cigarette smoker
    230062009Moderate cigarette smoker
    230059006Occasional cigarette smoker
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 365981007 (Tobacco smoking behavior - finding)

name: TobaccoSmokingStatus
title: Tobacco Smoking Status
publisher: National Resource Center for EHR Standards
description: This value set covers : All children (preferred term) of Finding relating to tobacco smoking behavior (finding) of the SNOMED CT
copyright: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement
